content:

  • personnel - -436750 (+990) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6876 (+24)
  • combat armored vehicles -13158 (+28)
  • Artillery systems -10855 (+44)
  • RSZV -1018 (0)
  • air defense means -723 (0)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level– 8510 (+47)
  • Winged rockets‒ 1992 (+0)
  • ships /boats- 26 (+0) from.
  • submarines- 1 (+0) from.
  • car equipment and tanks- 14407 (+63) by.
  • Special equipment‒ 1778 (+10).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 24.03.24.
title: Almost 1000 invaders, 44 artsystems and 28 BBM. New losses of Russia per day
author: Army Inform
